summary.span: 表示一个弹出菜单，该弹出菜单使控件能够公开特定于该控件的上下文的功能。

span.span: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着它可以包含的任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 属性类用于定义的位置和行为。The properties of the class are used to define the position and behavior of the . A或可以。A or can have a . 如果你将分配到或属性，类处理以响应用户交互的上下文菜单操作。If you assign a to the or property, the class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction. 工作的一部分未正在打开当用户单击鼠标右键按钮控件。Part of the work the does is opening the when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control. 由定义以下属性和类。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果上述任一属性上都设置和，属性值从使用。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - A自动放置在控件。A is automatically placed inside a control. 不能更改此行为。This behavior cannot be changed. ## 自定义 ContextMenu 控件Customizing the ContextMenu Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[ContextMenu 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/contextmenu-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建操作的文本。The following example creates a that manipulates the text of a . 该示例演示如何订阅和处理的事件中的对象。The example demonstrates how to subscribe to and handle the events of objects in a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为为要使用的回调委托。The property must be set to for the callback delegate to be used. 委托返回的可能相对于定义的点数组。The delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the . 当显示上下文菜单时，来最大化量选中了一点是可见的窗口。When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the window that is visible. 按原样弹出窗口，行为都是相同的。The behavior is the same as it is for the popup. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 指定的自定义弹出位置](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-specify-a-custom-popup-position.md)和[弹出窗口放置示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032)。For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-specify-a-custom-popup-position.md) and [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

value.span: 目标原点与弹出项对齐点之间的垂直距离。

span.span: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.

value.span: 有关目标原点和弹出项对齐点的信息，请参阅 [弹出窗口放置 Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.
